"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>a4e20f0a-9c29-11d8-aef7-889628b8efa3#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Karikatúra XVI. Lajosról</string>
            <string language="en">Caricature of Louis XVI.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karikatur von Louis XVI.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caricature de Louis XVI.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caricature de Louis XVI.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caricature di Louis XVI.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καρικατούρα του Louis XVI.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caricature de Louis XVI.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Janus arcú király. Karikatúra XVI. Lajosról, aki egyszerre szeretne megfelelni a Nemzetgyűlésnek és a klérusnak</string>
            <string language="en">The king with a Janus face. Caricature of Louis XVI. who wanted to satisfy both the assembly and the clergy.  </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">XVI. Lajos,  francia forradalom,  kiváltságos rendek,  </string>
            <string language="en">Louis XVI., French revolution, privileged classes</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der König mit einem Janus Gesicht. Karikatur von 
Louis XVI, wer die Versammlung und den Klerus erfüllen wollte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le roi avec un visage de Janus. Caricature de Louis 
XVI qui a voulu satisfaire l'assemblage et le clergé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O rei com uma cara de Janus. Caricature de Louis 
XVI. quem quis satisfer  ao conjunto e ao clergy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il re con una faccia di Janus. Caricature di Louis 
XVI chi ha desiderato soddisfare sia il complessivo che il clergy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο βασιλιάς με ένα πρόσωπο του Ιανού. 
Καρικατούρα του Louis XVI. ποιος θέλησε να ικανοποιήσει
και τη συμβολική γλώσσα και την ιεροσύνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El rey con una cara de Janus. Caricature de Louis 
XVI quién deseó satisfacer al ensamblaje y al clero.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Louis XVI, Französische Revolution, privilegierte Kategorien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Louis XVI, révolution française, classes privilégiées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Louis XVI., volta francesa, classes privilegiadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Louis XVI, giro francese, codici categoria privilegiati</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Λοuης XVI., γαλλική επανάσταση, προνομιούχες κλάσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Louis XVI, revolución francesa, clases privilegiadas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0

        </lifeCycle>

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
